    publications

    Published in Applied Physics Letters, 2014

    Recommended citation: F. Li, Z. M. Sheng, et al. Applied Physics Letters 105, 161102 (2014) https://drive.google.com/file/d/1S-30jInRFYMPPwm1i1VK5fV_UcdcBw2z/view?usp=drive_link

    Radially polarized, half-cycle, attosecond pulses from laser wakefields through coherent synchrotronlike radiation

    Published in Physical Review E, 2014

    Recommended citation: F. Li, Z. M. Sheng, et al. Physical Review E 90, 043104 (2014) https://drive.google.com/file/d/1aIZc3XbUy6T_ovCbviBMdiduXa0V8Lb9/view?usp=drive_link

    Particle resonances and trapping of direct laser acceleration in a laser-plasma channel

    Published in Physical Review Accelerators and Beams, 2021

    Recommended citation: F. Li, P. K. Singh, S. Palaniyappan, and C. Huang, Physical Review Accelerators and Beams 24, 041301 (2021) https://drive.google.com/file/d/1KFGZTYbHff1pens0bXv-YAZ0NjhJTM5h/view?usp=drive_link

    Vacuum laser acceleration of super-ponderomotive electrons using relativistic transparency injection

    Published in Nature Communications, 2022

    Recommended citation: P. Singh, F. Li, et al. Nature Communications 13, 54 (2022) https://drive.google.com/file/d/1DHl6WVoQ2BnTH2a5JCa3Cv6gsziU0XIw/view?usp=drive_link

    Parametric decay of Alfvénic wave packets in nonperiodic low-beta plasmas

    Published in Astrophys. J., 2022

    Recommended citation: Feiyu Li, Xiangrong Fu, Seth Dorfman 2022 Astrophys. J. 924 33 https://drive.google.com/file/d/1EDQDIltcl_J9Bi9O-GX2TRWeVLZQo2Vl/view?usp=drive_link

    CoSyR: A novel beam dynamics code for the modeling of synchrotron radiation effects

    Published in Astrophys. J., 2022

    Recommended citation: C.-K. Huang, F.-Y. Li, H.N. Rakotoarivelo, et al. 2022 Nuclear Inst. and Methods in Physics Research, A https://drive.google.com/file/d/1k_QExlIAnp3k-etGqq9rhEM9Fe_jm_Jq/view?usp=drive_link

    Hybrid simulation of Alfvén wave parametric decay instability in a laboratory relevant plasma

    Effects of wave damping and finite perpendicular scale on three-dimensional Alfvén wave parametric decay in low-beta plasmas

    Published in Phys. Plasmas, 2024

    CoSyR: coherent synchrotron radiation and self-consistent beam dynamics in synchrotrons
